content.rendered:
Football
ACC Year 7 Football
The Year 7 football team took on  St Joseph’s FTG at St Joseph’s FTG. The boys knew it was going to be a tough match against a very strong school. However, they didn’t perform as well as they would have wanted. The final score was 185 to 8.

ACC Year 8 Football
The Year 8 football team faced Mazenod College at Salesian College (Bosco Oval). Knowing Mazenod’s strength in football, the boys aimed for a victory after last week’s performance. Unfortunately, they lost by 10 goals, not achieving the desired result.

ACC Year 9 Football
The Year 9 football team competed against De La Salle at Salesian College (Bosco Oval), needing a win to secure a finals spot later in the term. They played exceptionally well against a strong opponent, winning with a final score of 87 to 57.

ACC Year 10 Football
The Year 10 football team played against St. Bernard’s at St. Bernard’s College. Despite anticipating a tough match, the boys were enthusiastic about their last game of the season. However, they suffered a 101-15 loss, not achieving the desired outcome. Nonetheless, they were commended for their efforts throughout the season.

ACC Senior Football
The senior team faced De La Salle at RSEA Park. The boys were excited to wear their new indigenous jumpers and participate in a ceremony before the game. Although they played hard, they fell short of victory, with a final score of 64 to 24.

Soccer
ACC Year 7A Soccer
The Year 7A soccer team competed against St. Bede’s (Mentone) at Bentleigh Greens Soccer Club. Despite expecting a tough match, the boys secured a strong victory with an 8-0 win.

ACC Year 7B Soccer
The Year 7B soccer team faced St. Bede’s (East Bentleigh), aiming to secure a top-two spot for finals. Although they performed well, they narrowly lost with a final score of 2-1.

ACC Year 8A Soccer
The Year 8A soccer team played against St. Bede’s (Mentone) at Bentleigh Greens Soccer Club. With a solid start, leading 1-0 at halftime, they maintained momentum and won the match 4-0.

ACC Year 8B Soccer
The Year 8B soccer team competed against St. Bernard’s at Salesian College (Mannix Campus). Needing a win to secure a spot for finals, the boys delivered with a solid 6-0 victory.

ACC Year 9A Soccer
The Year 9A soccer team faced St. Bernard’s at Gardiners Reserve Synthetic. They started and finished strong, securing a solid 3-1 victory against a formidable opponent.

ACC Year 9B Soccer
The Year 9B soccer team also played against St. Bernard’s at Salesian College (Mannix Campus), achieving a similar 3-1 victory. With consistent wins, they are likely heading into finals at the end of the term.

ACC Year 10 Soccer – The Year 10 soccer team competed against St. Bernard’s at St. Bernard’s College, resulting in a hard-fought 4-1 loss.

ACC Senior B Soccer – The senior B soccer team faced Mazenod at Salesian College (Mannix Campus). Despite knowing it would be a tough match, they played well but lost with a final score of 3-0.

ACC Senior A Soccer – The senior A soccer team played against Mazenod at Gardiners Reserve Synthetic, competing for the Davie-Egan Cup. Despite support from Carl Egan, they couldn’t secure victory, with Mazenod winning 5-3.

Badminton
ACC Junior Badminton
The junior team competed against Whitefriars at Mt Waverley Badminton Centre. Despite previous losses to Whitefriars, they made adjustments and secured a win, with a final score of 10 matches and 27 sets to 2 matches and 9 sets.

ACC Intermediate Badminton
The intermediate team played against De La Salle at De La Salle Gym. Despite expecting a tough game, they dominated with a final score of 12 matches and 36 sets to 0 matches and 0 sets.

ACC Senior Badminton
The senior team faced St. Joseph’s FTG at Beyond Badminton Centre, aiming for a top-two finish. They performed well, securing a strong win with a final score of 34 sets and 12 matches to St. Joseph’s FTG’s 2 sets and 0 matches.
